test.name: Execução dos cenários de testes no Firefox

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: /opt/robotframework/logs/pabot_results/1/geckodriver-1.log

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Cenário 1: Adicionar um produto no carrinho de compra com sucesso
Dado que estamos na Home Page do site fazendo uma busca por '${DESCRICAO}'
kw.sourcename: Dado que estamos na Home Page do site fazendo uma busca por '${DESCRICAO}'

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Faded Short Sleeve' into text field 'id:search_query_top'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Valida o resultado da busca com sucesso
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Image
kw.doc: Verifies image identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath://*[@id="center_column"]//a[contains(text(),"Faded Short Sleeve")]'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Valida a página do produto quanto ao preço da unidade e a descrição
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath://*[@id="center_column"]//h1[contains(text(),"Faded Short Sleeve")]'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Quando Adiciona o item no carrinho de compra
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então valida o carrinho de compra quanto aos seguintes dados: descrição, preço por unidade, preço do envio e preço total
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Image
kw.doc: Verifies image identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath://*[@id="product_1_1_0_0"]//a[contains(text(),"Faded Short Sleeve")]'.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Dado que estamos na Home Page do site fazendo uma busca por produto inexstente '${DESCRICAO_INEXISTENTE}'
kw.sourcename: Dado que estamos na Home Page do site fazendo uma busca por produto inexstente '${DESCRICAO_INEXISTENTE}'

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Dress Grey' into text field 'id:search_query_top'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Valida o resultado da busca com '${MSG_INEXISTENTE}'
kw.sourcename: Valida o resultado da busca com '${MSG_INEXISTENTE}'

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath://*[@id="center_column"]//p[contains(text(),"No results were found for your search")]'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
